Patterns in PerlMonks Searches

Neither search method supports any kind of patterns! Do not be tempted to try a [id://172854|regex], or anything remotely like one. Not even [id://361932|wildcards]!

No, all strings are interpreted as plain, simple strings. Search/SuperSearch simply look for these strings occurring anywhere in the title or body. (Search looks only in titles; SuperSearch looks in titles or bodies, as you choose.) No [id://505850|word boundaries] are inferred, either. And all searching is [id://208289|case-insensitive].

Note that, in SuperSearch, the default string separator is space, but this can be changed. In Quick Search, this default cannot be overridden.
